moves.1. e4: Nothing in the opening indicates the sharp tactical game that was about to occur
moves.1... d5 2. exd5 Nf6 3. Nc3 Bg4 4. Nf3 Nx:
! , This was the key move for attack. If the pawn is taken, black will have difficulty in castling in
a relatively open center
moves.8... Nxc3 9. bxc3 Bxc3 10. Rb1 Qc8: if 10 ... o-o, 11 Qd3 Ba5, 12 Qb5 Bxf3, 13 Bxf3 Bb6, 14 Bxb7 and black loses rook in compensation for bishop

if 13 ... Bxf3, 14Bxf3 Bb6, 15Qg5 Nf6, 16Qxg7 and white is much better.
If 15 ...Qd8, 16 Qxg7 Rf8, 17 Bxb7 Rb8 Bc6 and blacks troubles are huge
